Service Details: - Provides information and support for anyone with questions about dementia, including people with dementia, their caregivers, family and friends, professionals and the general public - Assists individuals in building the confidence to maintain quality of life when facing dementia - Trained staff and volunteers can provide you with information and support about understanding Alzheimer's disease and other dementia, getting a diagnosis, the progression of Alzheimer's disease and other dementias, personal planning for the future, maintaining independence, providing care and support, resources in your community including support groups, and upcoming educational workshops - All calls are confidential
